title: Saddam2690
author: Saddam2690
content: I found a side where if you have money connect to their side then mining starts. Every day money is returned from mining. My question is to know how is the side. Are they fake or not. This is trx (tron) wallet maining.This mining site link. https://tether-coin.vipIf there is a balance in the wallet, if you connect this link, mining will start. I want to know how real the matter is. Big companies are their partners, such as Binance,coingecko,token pocket,coinbase etc.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Man if that doesn't look like a scam to you, and knowing the craphole that this industry is, you need to be A LOT more skeptical in general.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on July 27, 2022, 07:05:02 AMMan if that doesn't look like a scam to you, and knowing the craphole that this industry is, you need to be A LOT more skeptical in general.OR, they could be subtly promoting the scam link for naive newbies, who might click in, to see what the site is about.The posts subtly talks about rewards, how to go about it and slips in credibility value based on partners (which I highly think are false).It's an assumption and I could be wrong, but I mostly see posts like this as clickbait.

comments.author: Saddam2690
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on July 27, 2022, 07:05:02 AMMan if that doesn't look like a scam to you, and knowing the craphole that this industry is, you need to be A LOT more skeptical in general.Can the site be any kind of scam to use?

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Saddam2690 on July 27, 2022, 05:42:08 AMI found a side where if you have money connect to their side then mining starts. Nothing more than a scam. Avoid.Quote from: Saddam2690 on July 27, 2022, 12:32:15 PMCan the site be any kind of scam to use?The site was created just three months ago. Avoid. Code:Registered On:2022-04-03Expires On:2023-04-03Updated On:2022-04-08Also avoid all cloud mining, they are all ponzi schemes. Later, investors will lose and you can be the victim at anytime.If you want to mine, you will have to make research about mining, check if it is profitable in your region, buy mining hardware and join a reputed mining pool after making sure your country support crypto mining.
